turns.ai_line: Doctor, abeg, I dey feel pain for my belle after I chop leftover rice wey I keep for house. I no fit chop again, e dey make me feel like say I wan vomit. Plus, I also dey experience running stomach. I dey live for area wey hot well well, so food fit spoil quick quick. I dey worry say na the rice cause am.

Doctor, wetin you think say fit cause this kind wahala? I don dey careful with wetin I dey chop so I surprise say this one happen. E fit be say na the rice spoil? I don drink plenty water but the pain no wan gree stop. You fit help me check am?
turns.user_input: Yes, I hope you check. If you be, if you be.

turns.ai_line: "Doctor, I still dey feel the pain for belle. E be like say my body dey hot small. I dey sweat and I no fit sleep well. Diarrhea sef dey worry me. Wetin I fit do now?"
turns.user_input: How do I know I am only a student please?
